303: The Payroll Manager will perform complex payroll functions (accounting, auditing, reporting, and analysis) for the company's U.S. payroll, and will actively participate in system and process re-engineering efforts and help support global payroll efforts.The ideal candidate will have a minimum of 10 years of payroll experience with at least 2 years in a supervisory role showing progressive growth in responsibilities (global payroll experience a plus). The individual must have expert knowledge of federal and state tax laws and must also have demonstrated capability and experience with ADP reporting, ADP GL, and ADP eTime.Our collaborative culture requires that the candidate work harmoniously and effectively with others as part of a team, as well as working well independently.
